book_name: You Are a Badass - How to Stop Doubting Your Greatness and Start Living an Awesome Life - by Jen Sincero
summary: In this chapter, Jen Sincero encourages readers to tap into the fearless creativity of their youth, where dreams are chased without the burden of judgment and fear of failure. She reflects on the exhilarating spontaneity of early adulthood, contrasting it with the jaded mindset that often accompanies age. Sincero emphasizes the importance of reconnecting with one's inner child to reignite passion and adventure in life. She offers practical advice on maintaining a playful attitude toward life, embracing the beginner's mindset, and prioritizing joy over unrealistic expectations. Ultimately, the chapter is a rallying cry to persist in our dreams regardless of age or circumstances.

slides.section_body: As children, we dream without boundaries, driven by curiosity and excitement. It’s essential to reconnect with that fearless spirit to unlock creativity and passion. Remember the times you felt invincible, where fun trumped fear.
slides.quote: “In the beginner’s mind, there are many possibilities.” —Shunryu Suzuki

slides.section_body: Adulthood often brings the illusion that responsibility means sacrificing joy. Challenge this notion by pursuing your passions unapologetically. Let go of what you think you 'should' do and embrace what energizes you.
slides.quote: “Why not?” is the best way to approach life.

slides.section_body: So many people exchange their dreams for a ‘realistic’ living, forgetting the thrill of chasing the extraordinary. Always strive to live fully, no matter your age. Choose purpose over passivity and actively seek your dreams.
slides.quote: You only get to be in your body for a limited time; celebrate the journey!

slides.section_body: Reflect on the moments when you felt completely in your element. Identify what made you light up and how to incorporate that into your life now. Revive the vigor and enthusiasm of those golden memories.
slides.quote: Think back to when you felt totally in your groove.

slides.section_body: Adopt a playful demeanor and approach life with curiosity. Shift your focus from pressure to possibility. What can you get away with? This mindset opens doors to new adventures and experiences.
slides.quote: I just wanna see what I can get away with!

slides.section_body: Engage in activities where you lose all sense of time—this is where magic happens. Identify your passions and prioritize them. Delegate or eliminate tasks that drain your energy and time.
slides.quote: When you’re in the Vortex, time disappears.

slides.section_body: Allow yourself to be a beginner again. This perspective nurtures spontaneity and joy in what you do. Balancing serious skill development with the playful fun of discovery keeps your passion alive.
slides.quote: Don’t lose the fun in the process of mastery.

slides.section_body: Acknowledge the importance of self-love in your journey. Embracing yourself attracts positivity and happiness, allowing you to live authentically. When you love yourself, life supports you in return.
slides.quote: The bluebirds of happiness will be your permanent backup singers.

slides.section_body: Life is an adventure waiting to be embraced. Reject mediocrity and strive to explore new terrains in your personal and professional life. Consistently seek out experiences that fill you with joy.
slides.quote: There’s nothing as unstoppable as a freight train full of fuck-yeah.

slides.section_body: Your dreams are valid and accessible at any stage of life. Fearlessly pursue what fulfills you and encourages joy. The adventure of life truly begins when you embrace who you are and what you desire.
slides.quote: Always choose to live your dreams, regardless of the noise around you.
